summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details transportation charges, discounts, and shipment summaries for various packages sent by Epstein, including specific dates and recipients.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary individual associated with the FedEx account and is the recipient of the invoice detailing shipping charges.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services totaling USD 147.63.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment on this date.

events.title: Package Delivered
events.description: A package sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was delivered to a recipient in Paris.

events.title: Package Delivered
events.description: Another package sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was delivered to a financial trust in St. Thomas.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
6100 Rod Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, VI
keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 19, 2004, and totals USD 147.63.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the account holder and recipient of the services.
The invoice includes details of multiple shipments, including dates of pickup and delivery.
There are discounts applied to the total charges, amounting to USD 54.33.
Specific shipment details include packages sent to both Paris and St. Thomas.
